Name: mal-cheriyamundamab-la
Author: Cheriyamundam Abdul Hameed And Kunhi Mohammed Parappoor

Translations.Text: parasparam perumanatikkuka enna karyam ninnale asrad'dhayilakkiyirikkunnu
pinneyum nis'sansayam ninnal valiye arinn keallum
jvalikkunna narakatte ninnal kanuka tanne ceyyum
pinne tirccayayum ninnal atine drdhamayum kannal kanuka tanne ceyyum
pinnit a divasattil sukhanubhavannale parri tirccayayum ninnal ceadyam ceyyappetukatanne ceyyum
